Package org.skistation.controllers

Class PassController

java.lang.Object
org.skistation.controllers.PassController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/passes") public class PassController extends Object
Controller for managing passes. It is responsible for handling requests related to passes.

    Constructs a new PassController with the specified pass service.

  • Method Details

    • getAllPasss

      @GetMapping("") public List<Pass> getAllPasss()
      Gets all passes.
      Returns:
      a list of all passes.

    • getPassById

      @GetMapping("{id}") public Pass getPassById(@PathVariable("id") Integer id)
      Gets a pass by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the pass.
      Returns:
      the pass with the specified ID.

    • addPass

      @PostMapping("/addPass") public String addPass(@RequestBody Pass ticket)
      Adds a new pass.
      Parameters:
      ticket - the pass to add.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the passes page.

    • deletePass

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public String deletePass(@PathVariable("id") Integer id)
      Deletes a pass.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the pass to delete.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the passes page.

    • suspendPass

      @PostMapping("/suspend/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Pass> suspendPass(@RequestBody Client clientData, @PathVariable("id") Integer id)
      Suspends a pass.
      Parameters:
      clientData - the client data.
      id - the ID of the pass to suspend.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the suspended pass, or a not found status if no such pass exists.

    • resumePass

      @PostMapping("/resume/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Pass> resumePass(@RequestBody Client clientData, @PathVariable("id") Integer id)
      Resumes a pass.
      Parameters:
      clientData - the client data.
      id - the ID of the pass to resume.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the resumed pass, or a not found status if no such pass exists.
